title: 3BIt
extract: A "bit" is an old fashioned slang term for an amount of money. 8 bits is a dollar. 2 bits is a $0.25 or a quarter. But when the term is used like the speaker used it, it just means low quality and cheap.Aug 24, 2016
extract_html: A "bit" is an old fashioned slang term for an amount of money. 8 bits is a dollar. 2 bits is a $0.25 or a quarter. But when the term is used like the speaker used it, it just means low quality and cheap.Aug 24, 2016
